title: Laggless lagg
body:
Hello mentlegens
It's been a few patch ( since 7.9) that i've started experiencing something that i can't quite define.
Visually is like lag, the champion moves slugghish, things seems to teleport from place to place, inputs like skillshots and spells not being recieved etc.
Now the problem is that i have no lagg
Mind you i play with a repeater in wi-fi but my usual connection is around 45-50 Mbps and 25 ping wich since now is been WAAAAY more then sufficient to play with league and many other games with higher requirements too.
About the no lagg problem, i've checked everything, directX, lol repairs, forums and such but ingame and out of game i get lagg meanwhile alt tabbing outside to teamspeak, cmd connected to EUW or any other speedtesting program shows that i have none.
I can't tell if this is a server issue but i've met none else who had this problem.
I can't tell if it is a bug.
I can't tell anything really.
Oh i also basically formatted my pc  and reinstalled LoL from scratch but the problem is EXACTLY the same.
Has anyone else ever experienced this? i really need help, as of now the game is unplayable for me.

I noticed that another discussion has been existing for 2 years witouth a solution
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/niaiIYt7-fps-and-ping-are-fine-but-still-laggingfreezing

replies.body:
I'm not sure why that other post was missed, if I had been around 2 years ago I could have helped all those people who thought we just didn't have an answer DX!

What you're most likely experiencing is packet loss. Essentially, parts of the data going from your network to our servers just isn't making it all the way and gets lost. If our servers don't get all the data, then it can't be 100% sure what was going on, which can cause that weird teleporting stuff and lag without your ping going up. 

Hit up our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and throw your recent network logs that had this issue in. It will give you an image detailing your ping and packet loss over time. Take a screenshot using something like Gyazo, post it here, and I can go over it with you!

http://imgur.com/a/wn2pg

here is the logs
I need to point out that there were two major spikes wich sucks, even tough the anomaly of the fact is that these laggs happen only with lol
Also what the heck 44 average ping but 25% packet loss WHUT, my teamspeak during the game pointed out something around 3% 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

P.S.
thanks in advance

I'd also like to add another screen from a game that  i played in the same day but earlier in the morning

http://imgur.com/a/deBM2

the games from the day before this one also show abnormally huge packet loss at a ping between 40 and 50 like the first image i posted

So yeeeaaaa....that 40-50% packet loss in the first image is a pretty big deal. That is most likely the cause of that lagless lag. Sometimes it can be fixed but there's a chance that it's coming from your ISP's side of things. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to help out!

About that second picture coming from a game played at a different time of day: the difference is probably coming from a number of people using the internet around you at that time of day.

Hey broporo thanks again for the help, ticket sent

I've been asking around and it might actually be a problem with TELECOM and League specifically
it seems some ISPs in fact do have poor IP management with league servers
I say it seems because telecom at least refuses to mark it as a problem
this is a link ( in italian ) that a friend of mine sent so at least it could be used for telecom user to make a petition of sort
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/it/c/aiuto-e-supporto-it/OWzJyZ9f-segnalazione-riot-problemi-di-connessione-con-telecom

so it's either that or no lol for me anymore :(

http://imgur.com/a/v9Y54
hi Broporo, thank you for replying, i hope this website works since i don't use Gyazo, as you said it has to do something with packet loss.
From the image i have 42 average milliseconds with 99 as the highest spike ( totally playable ) and 25.19% of packet loss, and just as it happened in my game, i started lagging slightly at the beginning and it got way worse over the time.

It looks like you're having the same packet loss issues as well =\ . That 30% packet loss is enough to cause some pretty weird things to happen in game, like if it looks like champions are "moonwalking" or teleporting around. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and they might be able to help out!
Been having the same issue for about a week now. I'm currently re-installing in the hopes that this fixes it, I doubt it will but it's worth a shot. I'll upload logs next time I play and it happens.

Hey, i've had the same exact problem, i'm from euw servers and i still do have this problem, for me it's not every single game, but every other or every other 2 games that happends, i see 40 ms in the right corner but it feels like 300-400 .. i can't explain this to myself and these games are really annoying to play, i can not abbandon because it would be wrong but i can't even play because then i feed, so i try to do the most without participating in teamfights and it's very frustrating, i hope someone with experience answers this question..
